item.title: Why Privacy?
item.description: The Beginning Over the past two years, I have been on a quest to reclaim my digital privacy (as much as possible). So how did this journey start? I think it all started with Linux, or GNU/Linux. My search for what GNU is led me to beginnings of the Free Software movement, Richard Stallman, and the four essential freedoms. All this led me to the question, “How much control do I have over my digital life?
